thread.title: Annette

author: Annette
title: Annette
text:
i loved the presentation and finish of my book ...BUT maybe a select button to rearrange the photos according to size and importance ..also i would have liked an easier way of navigating around the program to be able to change the order of the photos.
i had a frustrating time getting it to save when i had make corrections...
but all in all i am very happy with the result ..worth it to have such an amazing collection of a whole year of our lives in a beautiful table top book
PERHAPS A SUGGESTION FOR AN AUTO SPELLING CORRECTION AS WELL.
